H0.text: who was the temple of vesta built for. Diana

H1.text: who was the temple of vesta built for. Cybele

H2.text: who was the temple of vesta built for. Juno

H3.text: who was the temple of vesta built for. Vesta

A4.text: The temple housed Vesta's holy fire, which was a symbol of Rome's safety and prosperity.

A5.text: The Temple of Vesta, or the aedes (Latin Aedes Vestae; Italian: Tempio di Vesta), was an ancient edifice in Rome, Italy.
